claimAllRewards(address[],address).details: Claims all rewards for a user to the desired address, on all the assets of the pool, accumulating the pending rewards

params.assets: The list of assets to check eligible distributions before claiming rewards
params.to: The address that will be receiving the rewards

returns.claimedAmounts: List that contains the claimed amount per reward, following same order as "rewardList"*
returns.rewardsList: List of addresses of the reward tokens

claimAllRewardsOnBehalf(address[],addres.details: Claims all rewards for a user on behalf, on all the assets of the pool, accumulating the pending rewards. The caller must be whitelisted via "allowClaimOnBehalf" function by the RewardsAdmin role manager

params.assets: The list of assets to check eligible distributions before claiming rewards
params.to: The address that will be receiving the rewards
params.user: The address to check and claim rewards

returns.claimedAmounts: List that contains the claimed amount per reward, following same order as "rewardsList"*
returns.rewardsList: List of addresses of the reward tokens

claimAllRewardsToSelf(address[]).details: Claims all reward for msg.sender, on all the assets of the pool, accumulating the pending rewards

params.assets: The list of assets to check eligible distributions before claiming rewards

returns.claimedAmounts: List that contains the claimed amount per reward, following same order as "rewardsList"*
returns.rewardsList: List of addresses of the reward tokens

claimRewards(address[],uint256,address,a.details: Claims reward for a user to the desired address, on all the assets of the pool, accumulating the pending rewards

params.amount: The amount of rewards to claim
params.assets: List of assets to check eligible distributions before claiming rewards
params.reward: The address of the reward token
params.to: The address that will be receiving the rewards

claimRewardsOnBehalf(address[],uint256,a.details: Claims reward for a user on behalf, on all the assets of the pool, accumulating the pending rewards. The caller must be whitelisted via "allowClaimOnBehalf" function by the RewardsAdmin role manager

params.amount: The amount of rewards to claim
params.assets: The list of assets to check eligible distributions before claiming rewards
params.reward: The address of the reward token
params.to: The address that will be receiving the rewards
params.user: The address to check and claim rewards

claimRewardsToSelf(address[],uint256,add.details: Claims reward for msg.sender, on all the assets of the pool, accumulating the pending rewards

params.amount: The amount of rewards to claim
params.assets: The list of assets to check eligible distributions before claiming rewards
params.reward: The address of the reward token
